data.name: CountryMatchWithMultiContracts
data.value: Country match with more than one contract
data.comment: RCC Admin - Split Territory : If requested Territory/countries overlap between contracts

data.name: CountryMatchWithNoContract
data.value: Country(ies) do not match with contract
data.comment: RCC Admin - Split Territory : When at least one Requested Territory/country is not specified in any of the contracts, and there is more than one contract with no territory available

data.name: GloballyClearedFlag
data.comment: Global Clearance - Globally cleared flag set on resource

data.name: LossOfRights
data.comment: Auto Rejected

data.name: MAAutoApprovedFlag_WithNotification
data.value: No consent. Marketing will be notified by email; Permission subject to 10-days withholding period for Marketing appeal
data.comment: No consent and email is sent to marketing workgroup

data.name: MAAutoApprovedFlag_WithoutNotification
data.comment: No consent and no email is sent to marketing workgroup

data.name: NoContractAvailable
data.comment: RCC Admin - No resource or artist contract available

data.name: NoDigitalRights
data.comment: Auto Reject- No digital rights for Resource Contract(GRS)

data.name: NoLegalInternationalWorkgroupAvailable
data.comment: RCC Admin - No legal workgroup

data.name: NoMasterContract
data.comment: Auto Rejected - master contract not applicable

data.name: NoMatchRequestedAndContractCountry
data.value: no rights for all or part of requested country(ies)
data.comment: Auto Rejected - requested and contract territory/country do not match

data.name: NoMultiArtistCompilationRights
data.comment: Auto Rejected - multi artist request but GRS contract does not allow multi artist

data.name: NoPhysicalRights
data.comment: Auto Reject- No physical rights for Resource Contract(GRS)

data.name: NoTerritoryAndPreclearedMasterOrMultiArtist
data.value: Resource is on pre-cleared list. No contractual territories have been defined. Please review territorial rights
data.comment: Legal - No territory on the identified contract + precleared for master/multi artist

data.name: NoTerritoryOnContracts
data.comment: RCC Admin - No territory on the identified contract(s) when more than one contract is identified

data.name: OneStopFlag
data.comment: RCC Admin - One stop request

data.name: PreClearedFlag
data.comment: Auto Approved - Pre-Cleared Repertoire for master/multi artist + Territory mentioned in the contract

data.name: ProjectRoutingExceptionMsg
data.value: There is an exception occured in project level routing
data.comment: Message for project level exception

data.name: RegularTypeExistingReleaseWithMidOrBudget
data.value: Regular request for existing release at mid/budget price
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.name: RegularTypeNewReleaseWithBudget
data.value: Regular request for new release at budget price
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.name: RegularTypeNewReleaseWithMid
data.value: Regular request for new release at mid price
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.name: ResourceRoutingExceptionMsg
data.value: There is an exception occured in resource level routing
data.comment: Message for resource level exception

data.name: SensitiveExploitationAtProject
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.name: SensitiveExploitationAtResource
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.name: SkipMarketingRuleFourPointOne
data.value: Skipped International marketing for Regular compilation; Marketing will be notified by email; Permission subject to 10-days holding period for Marketing appeal
data.comment: SkipMarketing - Rule 4.1

data.name: SkipMarketingRuleFourPointTwo
data.value: Skipped International marketing for Regular price reduction request; Marketing will be notified by email; Permission subject to 10-days holding period for Marketing appeal
data.comment: SkipMarketing - Rule 4.2

data.name: SplitTerritory
data.value: Requested countries do not match with contractual countries
data.comment: Auto Rejected - If at least one of the requested countries does not match with the countries specified in any of the contracts

data.name: ThirdPartyCompany
data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer

data.comment: UMGI Marketing Reviewer
